newsitem.title: USA: First Union debuts cash management product.
newsitem.headline: First Union debuts cash management product.

text.p: First Union Corp said it has launched a new cash management product for small and mid-sized businsses.
First Union said the minimum balance a company needs to participate in its "All in One" program is $50,000, half the traditional threshold at other banks for a similar service.
First Union said the program is designed to help small and mid-sized businesses maximize the return on their cash assets by sweeping idle funds into overnight investments at the end of each day.
Customers can get account information through an online service known as PC InVision or through Business Fax, which sends a daily statement via facsimile by 0800 each day.
First Union said it named Frank Carter as the Cash Management Division's market segment manager for small and mid-sized businesses.
